summary: Implements the core logic for uploading Conan packages and recipes. It prepares the package layout, creates compressed archives of the recipe and binary files, checks whether an upload is required or forced based on remote revisions, and carries out the actual transfer to a remote server.
business_intent: Enables Conan users and CI pipelines to distribute compiled binaries and package metadata to remote repositories reliably and efficiently, supporting policies such as forced or skipped uploads.
